title: Orb spider
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all arthropods, see [list of arthropods](/List_of_arthropods "List of arthropods").*

| orb spider s [![Orb spider.png](/images/5/5a/Orb_spider.png)](/File:Orb_spider.png) |                                                                                                                                     |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                      | 27-56                                                                                                                               |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                          | 10                                                                                                                                  |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                      | 587                                                                                                                                 |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                             | 12 (spell: 200%)                                                                                                                    |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                  | 3                                                                                                                                   |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                            | 10                                                                                                                                  |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                      | 40                                                                                                                                  |
| Attack1                                                                             | 15 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                  |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                             | None                                                                                                                                |

| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                        | [Animal](/Category:Animal_intelligence "Category:Animal intelligence")                                                              |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                    | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                                                                      |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                    | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                                                                   |

| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                | spider, orb spider                                                                                                                  |

|   |                                                                                                                           |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An eerily glowing spider with strands of pure energy emerging from its spinnerets. It seems to want to keep its distance. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Orb spiders** are obnoxious and dangerous [arachnids](/List_of_arachnids "List of arachnids") that tend to avoid direct combat with you, lingering at the edge of your [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight") and hurling [Orbs of Destruction](/Orbs_of_Destruction "Orbs of Destruction") at you whenever you stop pursuing them. Their tendency to appear in areas filled with [web](/Web "Web") [traps](/Trap "Trap") only makes them more of a threat. They can be found in the [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest"), particularly on the lower floors.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                       |                                                      |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Orb of Destruction](/Orb_of_Destruction "Orb of Destruction") (9d11) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Orb spiders can deal a good amount of damage, but they are quite fragile. Use ranged attacks to kill them fast.
  - [Poison](/Poison "Poison") [darts](/Dart "Dart") are very effective, even with 0 Throwing skill. As these spiders are weak to poison, applying only a few darts will inflict a lethal amount of poison.
- With decent footwork or perhaps a quick [Blink](/Blink "Blink"), you can dodge their [Orbs of Destruction](/Orbs_of_Destruction "Orbs of Destruction"). Once you've managed that, the orb will take several turns to circle back around for another pass, which may take it into another spider, a wall, or even the orb spider that cast it.
- [Summons](/Summon "Summon") can be a great way to block their orbs.
- Orb Spiders have a relatively low amount of hit dice, making them a good target for a [wand of polymorph](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph") if you don't have a good ranged weapon.
- If you have trouble chasing down orb spiders, use [curare](/Curare "Curare")-tipped [darts](/Dart "Dart") to slow them down.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), orb spiders only had 7 [HD](/HD "HD") and their bites did 5 damage.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), orb spider corpses gave inedible [chunks](/Chunk "Chunk").
- Orb spiders were introduced in [0.11](/0.11 "0.11").
html:
Orb spider

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

orb spider s 
HP 27-56
HD 10
XP 587
Speed 12 (spell: 200%)
AC 3
EV 10
Will 40
Attack1 15 (bite: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities Poison
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type spider, orb spider
Flags No skeleton
Web immune
Maintain range
An eerily glowing spider with strands of pure energy emerging from its spinnerets. It seems to want to keep its distance.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Orb spiders are obnoxious and dangerous arachnids that tend to avoid direct combat with you, lingering at the edge of your line of sight and hurling Orbs of Destruction at you whenever you stop pursuing them. Their tendency to appear in areas filled with web traps only makes them more of a threat. They can be found in the Spider's Nest, particularly on the lower floors.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Orb of Destruction (9d11) Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Orb spiders can deal a good amount of damage, but they are quite fragile. Use ranged attacks to kill them fast.
    • Poison darts are very effective, even with 0 Throwing skill. As these spiders are weak to poison, applying only a few darts will inflict a lethal amount of poison.
  • With decent footwork or perhaps a quick Blink, you can dodge their Orbs of Destruction. Once you've managed that, the orb will take several turns to circle back around for another pass, which may take it into another spider, a wall, or even the orb spider that cast it.
  • Summons can be a great way to block their orbs.
  • Orb Spiders have a relatively low amount of hit dice, making them a good target for a wand of polymorph if you don't have a good ranged weapon.
  • If you have trouble chasing down orb spiders, use curare-tipped darts to slow them down.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, orb spiders only had 7 HD and their bites did 5 damage.
  • Prior to 0.17, orb spider corpses gave inedible chunks.
  • Orb spiders were introduced in 0.11.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Orb_spider&oldid=80313"

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{list of | arthropods}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Orb spiders''' are obnoxious and dangerous [[list of arachnids|arachnids]] that tend to avoid direct combat with you, lingering at the edge of your [[line of sight]] and hurling [[Orbs of Destruction]] at you whenever you stop pursuing them. Their tendency to appear in areas filled with [[web]] [[trap]]s only makes them more of a threat. They can be found in the [[Spider's Nest]], particularly on the lower floors.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Orb spiders can deal a good amount of damage, but they are quite fragile. Use ranged attacks to kill them fast.
**[[Poison]] [[dart]]s are very effective, even with 0 Throwing skill. As these spiders are weak to poison, applying only a few darts will inflict a lethal amount of poison.
*With decent footwork or perhaps a quick [[Blink]], you can dodge their [[Orbs of Destruction]]. Once you've managed that, the orb will take several turns to circle back around for another pass, which may take it into another spider, a wall, or even the orb spider that cast it.
*[[Summon]]s can be a great way to block their orbs.
*Orb Spiders have a relatively low amount of hit dice, making them a good target for a [[wand of polymorph]] if you don't have a good ranged weapon.
*If you have trouble chasing down orb spiders, use [[curare]]-tipped [[dart]]s to slow them down.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], orb spiders only had 7 [[HD]] and their bites did 5 damage.
*Prior to [[0.17]], orb spider corpses gave inedible [[chunk]]s.
*Orb spiders were introduced in [[0.11]].

[[Category:Arachnid]]
